selenium.settings.title: selenium Settings
selenium.tooltip.entity_culling: Cull entities based on direction/distance to reduce overdraw.
selenium.tooltip.behind_culling: Cull entities behind the camera within limits.
selenium.tooltip.entity_y_band: Cull entities outside the vertical Y-band around camera.
selenium.tooltip.chunk_culling: Cull occluded/far chunk sections to save GPU/CPU.
selenium.tooltip.chunk_y_band: Cull chunk sections outside the vertical Y-band.
selenium.tooltip.blockentity_culling: Cull block entities (chests, furnaces) when hidden.
selenium.tooltip.dynamic_y_band: Auto-adjust Y-band size based on speed/look.
selenium.tooltip.debug_mode: Always show counters even without F3.
selenium.tooltip.predictive_prefetch: Prefetch some slices ahead in a narrow cone.
selenium.tooltip.lod_throttling: Skip some updates for far entities/block-entities.
selenium.tooltip.partial_meshing: Incremental rebuilds of dirty chunk slices only.
selenium.tooltip.render_scheduler: Smooth out spikes by time-slicing render tasks.
selenium.tooltip.visibility_deprioritiza: Cache hidden sections; after N frames, unhide gradually.
selenium.tooltip.particle_distance_scali: Thin and shrink particles with distance for performance.
selenium.tooltip.screen_space_budgeter: Budget work by on-screen area to stabilize frame time.
selenium.tooltip.turn_bias_prefetch: Bias prefetching towards recent camera turn direction.
selenium.tooltip.micro_stutter_guard: Drop optional work after long frames to avoid cascades.
selenium.tooltip.particle_tile_budget: Limit particles per tile to reduce bursts.
